title: Topic 002 Question 105
body: You have an Azure subscription that contains a user named User1 and a storage account named storage1. The storage1 account contains the resources shown in the following table.
User1 is assigned the following roles for storage1:
•	Storage File Data SMB Share Reader
In storage1, you create a shared access signature (SAS) named SAS1 as shown in the following exhibit.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
